knowledgeGraph.title: Clark Fork Valley Hospital
knowledgeGraph.description: Clark Fork Valley Hospital is a full-service community hospital in Plains, Montana, USA. The hospital features a 24/7 emergency department, Intensive Care Unit, Family Birthing Center, and a complete ...

organic.title: Plains Family Medicine - Clark Fork Valley Hospital
organic.snippet: Scheduling. Please call (406) 826-4810 to schedule an appointment at Plains Family Medicine with one of our providers. walk-in care services.

organic.title: Primary Care - Family Medicine Network - Clark Fork Valley Hospital
organic.snippet: Our Family Medicine Network provides a unique base of service to Sanders County with three family medicine offices and a rehabilitation program.

organic.snippet: In an effort to extend our quality of care, our Family Medicine Network operates three family medicine offices located in Thompson Falls, Plains and Hot Springs ...
